org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.css

Class CSSDocument

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.common.SourceLocation
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.css.CSSDocument
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISourceLocation, ICSSDocument, ICSSNode

    public class CSSDocument
extends SourceLocation
implements ICSSDocument
    Implementation of a CSS model.

    • Field Detail

      • children

        protected final List<ICSSNode> children
        A list of children nodes. The sub-classes can add nodes to this list in their constructors.

           org.antlr.runtime.TokenStream tokenStream)
        Create a root CSS definition.
        Parameters:
        rules - CSS rules
        namespaces - @namespace statements
        fontFaces - @font-face statements
        tree - root of the AST

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public static CSSDocument parse(org.antlr.runtime.CharStream input,
                Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems)
        Parse a CSS document into ICSSDocument model.
        Parameters:
        input - ANTLR input stream. The CharStream#getSourceName() must be implemented in order to make source location work.
        problems - Parsing problems will be aggregated in this collection.
        Returns:
        CSS DOM object.
